title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http:contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: Sotkanet API R tools

title: Sotkanet API R tools
text: Load sotkanet libraries used vignette List available Sotkanet indicators: List geographical regions available indicators:
code: sotkanet.indicators <- SotkanetIndicators(type = "table") # kable(head(sotkanet.indicators)) options(width = 60) sotkanet.regions <- SotkanetRegions(type = "table") kable(head(sotkanet.regions))

title: Sotkanet API R tools
text: Get indicator . 10013 (Unemployment rate young people aged 16-24 years) Sotkanet, Finland (Suomi) 1990-2012 (Eurostat employment statistics youth unemployment), plot graph:
code: # Get indicator data dat <- GetDataSotkanet(indicators = 10013, years = 1990:2012,                     genders = c('female', 'male', 'total'),                 region.category = "EUROOPPA", regions = "Suomi")  # Investigate the first lines in the data kable(head(dat)) %>%    kable_styling() %>%   kableExtra::scroll_box(width = "100%")

title: Sotkanet API R tools
text: takes long time recommended regular use. Save data local disk work.
code: # These indicators have problems with R routines: problematic.indicators <- c(1575, 1743, 1826, 1861, 1882, 1924, 1952, 2000,                              2001, 2033, 2050, 3386, 3443)  # Get data for all indicators datlist <- list() for (ind in setdiff(sotkanet.indicators$indicator, problematic.indicators)) {   datlist[[as.character(ind)]] <- GetDataSotkanet(indicators = ind,          years = 1990:2013, genders = c('female', 'male', 'total')) }  # Combine tables (this may require considerable time and memory  # for the full data set) dat <- do.call("rbind", datlist)

title: Sotkanet API R tools
text: Download visualize time series:  Investigate effect municipality size demographic variation. Smaller municipalities show random variation expected statistical arguments:
code: # Pick indicator name indicator.name <- as.character(unique(dat$indicator.title.fi)) indicator.source <- as.character(unique(dat$indicator.organization.title.fi))  # Visualize library(ggplot2) theme_set(theme_bw(20));  p <- ggplot(dat, aes(x = year, y = primary.value, group = gender, color = gender))  p <- p + geom_line() + ggtitle(paste(indicator.name, indicator.source, sep = " / "))  p <- p + xlab("Year") + ylab("Value")  p <- p + theme(title = element_text(size = 10)) p <- p + theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 20)) p <- p + theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 20)) p <- p + theme(legend.title = element_text(size = 15)) print(p) selected.inds <- c(127, 178) dat <- GetDataSotkanet(indicators = selected.inds,                  years = 2011, genders = c('total')) # Pick necessary fields and remove duplicates datf <- dat[, c("region.title.fi", "indicator.title.fi", "primary.value")] datf <- datf[!duplicated(datf),] dw <- reshape(datf, idvar = "region.title.fi",                  timevar = "indicator.title.fi", direction = "wide") names(dw) <- c("Municipality", "Population", "Migration") p <- ggplot(dw, aes(x = log10(Population), y = Migration)) +        geom_point(size = 3)        ggtitle("Migration vs. population size")  #> $title #> [1] "Migration vs. population size" #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "labels"        theme(title = element_text(size = 15)) #> List of 1 #>  $ title:List of 11 #>   ..$ family       : NULL #>   ..$ face         : NULL #>   ..$ colour       : NULL #>   ..$ size         : num 15 #>   ..$ hjust        : NULL #>   ..$ vjust        : NULL #>   ..$ angle        : NULL #>   ..$ lineheight   : NULL #>   ..$ margin       : NULL #>   ..$ debug        : NULL #>   ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE #>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element" #>  - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg" #>  - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE #>  - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE        theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 20)) #> List of 1 #>  $ axis.title.x:List of 11 #>   ..$ family       : NULL #>   ..$ face         : NULL #>   ..$ colour       : NULL #>   ..$ size         : num 20 #>   ..$ hjust        : NULL #>   ..$ vjust        : NULL #>   ..$ angle        : NULL #>   ..$ lineheight   : NULL #>   ..$ margin       : NULL #>   ..$ debug        : NULL #>   ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE #>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element" #>  - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg" #>  - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE #>  - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE        theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 20)) #> List of 1 #>  $ axis.title.y:List of 11 #>   ..$ family       : NULL #>   ..$ face         : NULL #>   ..$ colour       : NULL #>   ..$ size         : num 20 #>   ..$ hjust        : NULL #>   ..$ vjust        : NULL #>   ..$ angle        : NULL #>   ..$ lineheight   : NULL #>   ..$ margin       : NULL #>   ..$ debug        : NULL #>   ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE #>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element" #>  - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg" #>  - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE #>  - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE        theme(legend.title = element_text(size = 15)) #> List of 1 #>  $ legend.title:List of 11 #>   ..$ family       : NULL #>   ..$ face         : NULL #>   ..$ colour       : NULL #>   ..$ size         : num 15 #>   ..$ hjust        : NULL #>   ..$ vjust        : NULL #>   ..$ angle        : NULL #>   ..$ lineheight   : NULL #>   ..$ margin       : NULL #>   ..$ debug        : NULL #>   ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE #>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element" #>  - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg" #>  - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE #>  - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE print(p)

title: Sotkanet API R tools
text: Cite SOTKAnet link https://sotkanet.fi/sotkanet/fi/index. Also mention indicator provider. Full license terms use. Central points: SOTKAnet REST API meant non-regular data queries. Avoid regular repeated downloads. SOTKAnet API can used basis systems Metadata regions indicators CC-4.0 THL indicators CC-4.0 Indicators provided third parties can used separate agreement!

title: sotkanet R package
text: R package access manipulate data Sotkanet demographics indicator database. Sotkanet data portal provides 2000 demographic indicators across Finland Europe, maintained National Institute Health Welfare (THL). information, see data description.

title: sotkanet R package
text: can install stable release version CRAN: Alternatively, can install development version sotkanet package GitHub :

title: sotkanet R package
text: Load package R: List available indicators Sotkanet data portal: simple example data retrieval visualization, using indicator describing private dental care use among 0-17 years old 2015-2020.  -depth examples, see package vignette online tutorial page.
code: library(sotkanet) sotkanet.indicators <- SotkanetIndicators() head(sotkanet.indicators$indicator.title.fi) #> [1] "Mielenterveyden häiriöihin sairaalahoitoa saaneet 0 - 17-vuotiaat / 1 000 vastaavanikäistä"              #> [2] "Toimeentulotukea saaneet 25 - 64-vuotiaat, % vastaavanikäisestä väestöstä"                               #> [3] "Somaattisen erikoissairaanhoidon vuodeosastohoitopäivät 75 vuotta täyttäneillä / 1 000 vastaavanikäistä" #> [4] "0 - 6-vuotiaat, % väestöstä"                                                                             #> [5] "0 - 6-vuotiaat, % väestöstä, väestöennuste 2060"                                                         #> [6] "Yhden vanhemman perheet, % lapsiperheistä" library(ggplot2)  hammashoito <- GetDataSotkanet(indicators = 1075, years = 2015:2020, genders = "total", region.category = "MAAKUNTA")  # Indicator title tells what this all is about unique(hammashoito$indicator.title.fi) #> [1] "Yksityisen hammashuollon käynnit 0 - 17-vuotiailla / 1 000 vastaavanikäistä"  # Some data has to be retrieved separately hammashoito_metadata <- SotkanetIndicatorMetadata(id = 1075)  plot_caption <- paste0("Lähde: Sotkanet \n",                        "Data päivitetty ", hammashoito_metadata$`data-updated`)  plot <- ggplot(hammashoito,aes(x=year,y=primary.value,group=region.title.fi))+   geom_line(aes(color=region.title.fi)) +   geom_point(aes(color=region.title.fi))  plot + labs(title = "Yksityisen hammashuollon käynnit",             subtitle = "0 - 17-vuotiailla / 1 000 vastaavanikäistä",             x = "Vuosi",              y = "Käyntien lkm",             caption = plot_caption,             color = "Maakunta")

title: Retrieve Sotkanet Data — GetDataSotkanet
text: Retrieve selected data combine single table.

title: Retrieve Sotkanet Data — GetDataSotkanet
code: GetDataSotkanet(   indicators,   years = 1991:2015,   genders = c("total"),   regions = NULL,   region.category = NULL )

title: Retrieve Sotkanet Data — GetDataSotkanet
text: indicators Dataset identifier(s) years vector years c(2010, 2012, ... ) genders vector genders ('male' | 'female' | 'total') regions filter selected regions (default: regions) region.category filter one following 14 valid  regions categories (default: categories) "ALUEHALLINTOVIRASTO" "ELY-KESKUS" "ERVA" "EURALUEET" (Eurozone) "EUROOPPA" (Europe) "HYVINVOINTIALUE" (welfare country) "KUNTA" (municipality) "MAA" (country) "MAAKUNTA" (region) "NUTS1" "POHJOISMAAT" (Nordic countries) "SAIRAANHOITOPIIRI (hospital district) "SEUTUKUNTA" "SUURALUE"

title: sotkanet 0.9.77 (2022-01-31)
text: Functions pointing external resources (sotkanet.json_query sotkanet.csv_query) now fail gracefully. New internal functions graceful_http.R file New dependencies / imports: httr package handling URLs error messages curl package internet connection testing. jsonlite handling data json files

title: sotkanet 0.9.77 (2022-01-31)
text: Removed internal functions: GetDataSotkanetSingleIndicator SotkanetData. Removed dependency / import: rjson

title: sotkanet 0.9.77 (2022-01-31)
text: Functionalities GetDataSotkanetSingleIndicator SotkanetData now embedded one function, GetDataSotkanet. files ./R/ folder renamed better legibility: internal.R SotkanetCollect.R sotkanet.R SotkanetRegions.R New alias downloading indicator metadata: SotkanetIndicatorMetadata() (usesSotkanetIndicator(id))
